Microsoft collects this information to provide the best experiences with their products and to operate their business. The telemetry is collected through customer usage attribution. options.text: To enable identity (AuthN/AuthZ) for workloads in landing zones, you must allocate an identity Subscription that is dedicated to host your Active Directory domain controllers. Please note, this Subscription will be moved to the identity Management Group, and ARM will assign the selected policies. We recommend using a new Subscription with no existing resources.
To enable identity (AuthN/AuthZ) for workloads in landing zones, it is recommended to assign specific policies to govern the virtual machines used for Active Directory domain controllers.
